Hi, it worked. Just follow haengyong's instructions!

1) Download it.
2) Open DMG.
3) Open the .iso file on DMG, and ignore any warning that pops up, and install.
4) Then open the patch, and patch the game.
5) Then open the crack and crack the game.
6) Restart computer, and then play game.

Game works like a treat. Amazing stuff!

Alright. I got it working, whilst running Lion - using the old cracks. Download it. Then do it in this order.

1- Run .iso and install.
2 - run the 11.1 patch
3 - run the 11.1 crack
4 - run the app - it'll fail to open
5 - run the 11.3 patch (download from their website)
6 - enjoy your game. hope this helps.
